source_data.description: English idioms, in this course we will explore the most commonly used idioms in everyday conversations, business settings, and casual speech. Idioms are essential for sounding natural and fluent in English, as they give language a more native and expressive feel. This course will cover popular idiomatic expressions, their meanings, and how to use them correctly in different situations. You will learn idioms related to work, travel, emotions, weather, and daily interactions, helping you understand native speakers better and respond confidently. Through interactive exercises, real-life dialogues, and fun storytelling, you will practice using idioms naturally in conversations. Whether you’re preparing for exams, work, or improving fluency, this course will help you speak English with more confidence and clarity while making your speech sound more engaging and authentic. EnglishAnyone
